entry.title: US Elections, Crypto Markets, AI, and New Media with Mario Nawfal
entry.summary: Mario Nawfal is a serial entrepreneur and a prominent figure in the crypto industry. We discussed a range of topics from the industry’s ethos and Mario’s insights on why the industry is attractive to many, to the declining trust in mainstream media and the role of independent publications and citizen journalism. We also discuss pressing issues like the politicization of crypto in the US. Finally, Mario offers his outlook for the industry and shares some advice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

entry.title: Latest on Chainlink, Cross-Chain Communication, and Tokenization with Sergey Nazarov
entry.summary: Sergey Nazarov is the Co-Founder of Chainlink, a decentralized oracle network that provides data for smart contracts and facilitates cross-chain communication. Sergey shares his thoughts on the growing crypto scene in Dubai, reflects on the future of tokenization, and discusses the latest on Chainlink's Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) and what it enables. This interview was recorded during Token2049 in Dubai.
